meter_reading.notes: Odometer reads 2271.1 m³. The red needle is past the 0.03 mark, pointing at approximately the 3rd minor tick after 0.03, which corresponds to 0.036 m³ (each minor tick represents 0.002 m³). The angle is calculated assuming 0.00 is at 180 degrees (6 o'clock) and increases clockwise, with each 0.01 increment being 36 degrees.
